body.name: TechGarden Wireless Bluetooth Mouse, Dual Mode (Bluetooth 4.0 + USB) Silent Bluetooth Wireless Mouse with USB Nano Receiver, 3 DPI Levels for Laptop, PC, MacBook, iPad, Tablet - Black
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Thursday, February 22 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
features: Dual Mode Bluetooth Mouse: With dual mode (BT 4.0 + 2.4GHz) connection, the wireless computer mouse can easily switch between two devices only by pressing the switch button.
3 DPI Switch: With high-performance optical tracking technology, up to 2400 dpi (1000, 1600, 2400) accurately tracking, to meet your different needs.

Quite & Comfortable: With slim, ergonomic design and smooth frosted surface, this Bluetooth mouse will fit comfortably in your hands, providing an incredible user experience. Quiet click allows quiet working environment.

Auto Sleep Mode: The mouse will automatically enter into the sleep mode after a few minutes of inactivity to save power, and it can be waken up by clicking any button. The mouse requires one AA battery (not included).

Broad Compatiblity: Bluetooth mode works with Windows / Android / MAC OS system. 2.4GHz mode works with PC, laptop, desktop or any device with USB port, simply plug and play. (Note: The USB receiver is stored in the battery compartment of the mouse)
body.description: Bluetooth 4.0: No need to occupy PC interface, fast and stable connection. Support Windows 8/10, Mac OS × 10.10 or higher version, Android 4.3 or higher version. 2.4G wireless: For devices without Bluetooth function, just plug the USB receiver, no additional driver or software needed. 3 Adjustable DPI Change DPI(1000/ 1600/ 2400) rapidly depending on your preference or the type of sensitivity the task requires. Allows quickness and accuracy to respond. Easy-Switch up to 2 Devices With Bluetooth/USB wireless connectivity, the mouse can easily connect with up to 2 devices. You can freely control two devices, from your desktop to tablet, laptop to Macbook. Simply switch between two devices by just one click. Package Include: 1* Wireless Mouse 1* USB Receiver 1* User Manual

productInformation.name: Customer Reviews

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 2, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars TechGarden Wireless Bluetooth Mouse: A Seamless Blend of Reliability and Convenience
reviews.reviewText: I recently started using the TechGarden Wireless Bluetooth Mouse with Dual Mode (Bluetooth 4.0 + USB), and it has been a stellar experience. This mouse exemplifies what a modern, tech-savvy user looks for in a peripheral device: reliability, durability, and seamless connectivity.One of the most commendable features of this mouse is its dual connectivity option. The ability to switch between Bluetooth and USB modes provides a high degree of flexibility and convenience. This feature is especially useful when working across different devices or when Bluetooth connectivity is not available. The Bluetooth 4.0 connectivity is impressively consistent, ensuring smooth and uninterrupted operation.The durability of the TechGarden mouse is another aspect worth highlighting. It feels solid and well-built, capable of withstanding the rigors of daily use. This durability is a significant factor considering the frequent travel and movement associated with portable devices.Battery life is a crucial consideration for wireless devices, and this mouse excels in this regard. The batteries last an impressively long time, minimizing the hassle of frequent replacements and ensuring the mouse is always ready for use. This extended battery life is not just convenient but also cost-effective in the long run.The design and ergonomics of the mouse deserve a special mention. It is comfortable to use for extended periods, which is important for those, like me, who spend considerable time on their computers. The responsive and smooth tracking enhances the user experience, making everyday tasks more efficient and enjoyable.In conclusion, the TechGarden Wireless Bluetooth Mouse is an excellent choice for anyone seeking a reliable, durable, and versatile mouse. Its dual-mode connectivity, long battery life, sturdy build, and ergonomic design make it a standout product in its category. I highly recommend this mouse to anyone looking for a high-quality wireless mouse that delivers consistent performance and user-friendly features.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 13, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love this mouse
reviews.reviewText: The clicking of my old mouse was driving me nuts. I love the feel and, most of all, silence of this one! It works great, looks great, and sounds great. It's not completely silent, but quiet enough that I don't notice the click at all.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Works for iPad!
reviews.reviewText: Slim, lightweight, comfortable, and works great for iPad!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars For my chromebook Bluetooth vs Usb
reviews.reviewText: Works great with my Chrome book. Wanted Bluetooth since Chrome book has few USB ports. Works great. Connection was a challenge but got it working and no problems since.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 24, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Quiet and easy to use
reviews.reviewText: This mouse is fantastic for the price. It has a quiet click and feels good in your hand. It also has smooth tracking and is slim. I have ordered multiples to leave with my different computers. Would highly recommend.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 19, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect for buisness travel. Smooth feel
reviews.reviewText: Love the fact it easily pairs with my BT enabled laptop without needing the USB plug in. Thin profile fits easily into laptop case pockets. No lag for regular buisness operations. Love the auto shut off/sleep if the mouse doesn't get used, it really saves the battery.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 21, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars My favorite mouse ever!!!
reviews.reviewText: This a great mouse...quiet, responsive, and comfortable...connect quickly and reliably on Windows and Linux systems. Great value too!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 2, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Just like my previous mouse, almost.
reviews.reviewText: The only difference I noticed was to unlock my screensaver, rather than press the spacebar, I press the mouse. Otherwise it works very nicely.
